page.title: 19Housing cont.
page.content: north of the town again of brick semi-detached houses with gardens. In 1960, a small block of flats was built close to the town centre. It is only three storeys high and brick built with a rendered and painted exterior. The latest development of housing is a small estate of light-coloured brick and flat-roofed houses built in small terraces with a large green in the middle and a network of footpaths. Privately owned housing is to be found in small developments on the outskirts of town, in three directions. It consists of detached and semi-detached houses with garages and small gardens.Interspersed with the old stone houses and the modern housing estates are pockets of Victorian terraced housing made from red brick with very small garden to the front and small yards to the rear.
